1384780.name: Paradise Killer Soundtrack
1384780.description:
Remember when we danced along the beach? Along the streets of Paradise? You made me this mix tape on the roof of your apartment block. We stared at the moon. You said you'd kill the moon. I didn't believe you. I was wrong.

The original soundtrack to the game Paradise Killer.

Written, produced and recorded by Barry "Epoch" Topping.

Additional vocals by Fiona Lynch
Additional saxophone by Fabian Hernandez
Additional guitar by Thomas Temple

Cover art by Curran "Gigalithic" Gregory / Oli Clarke Smith
